short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SteamAuth is a browser extension that allows you sharing your Inventory or Trading Data with other websites securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Steamauth is a universal app that can run on various websites, so it does not need to be installed separately for each website. Steamauth is a browser extension that allows you to share your data securely with other websites. We only share your data with your permission - you will always be asked for authorization. Your data is shared securely and encrypted. We can access inventory, trade status, and trade information.
